Cops : Episode Guide
Series Overview Upcoming Airings Episodes Videos Photos News User Reviews Cast&Crew # Name Air Date 330. Albuquerque, New Mexico Albuquerque, N.M.: drug arrests; pregnant woman assaulted; paint sniffer arrested; accidental shooting. 04-13-1996 332. Albuquerque, New Mexico Police officers in Albuquerque, N.M., chase a suspect wanted on felony charges and question a drunken man. 05-04-1996 480. Albuquerque, New Mexico In Albuquerque; man allegedly threatens motel guests with knife; suspects possess a gun and marijuana; prostitution sting. 05-06-2000 316. Albuquerque, New Mexico Albuquerque, N.M.; drug busts; alleged harassment case; hit-and-run report; armed motorist in disguise. 02-03-1996 322. Albuquerque, New Mexico An Albuquerque, N.M., officer encounters a woman allegedly strangling a man with a sock; a search for a suspected shoplifter. 02-10-1996 334. Albuquerque, New Mexico An Albuquerque, N.M., deputy pursues man who allegedly kidnapped and held a driver at gunpoint; an alleged suicide attempt. 05-18-1996 337. Albuquerque, New Mexico A raid on an Albuquerque, N.M., home where heroin is allegedly trafficked; a man is accused of using a stolen credit card. 06-29-1996 479. Albuquerque, New Mexico In Albuquerque; officers believe a transvestite is hiding cocaine in his mouth; suspect has an empty holster; counterfeit money. 04-29-2000 477. Albuquerque, New Mexico In Albuquerque; suspicious suspects in automobile; theft of a cross-dresser's purse; cake is thrown in a woman's face. 04-15-2000 335. Albuquerque, New Mexico A woman is arrested in Albuquerque, N.M., while her children watch; suspected drug dealers are accused of selling soap as crack. 05-25-1996 336. Albuquerque, New Mexico Cops break up domestic wrangle in Albuquerque, N.M.; suspected thief is detained; a man is found unconscious after an alleged drug overdose. 06-22-1996 576. Albuquerque, NM; Albuquerque, NM; Nashville, TN: Coast to Coast An officer advises a 17-year-old driver not to pick up strangers; a truck driver says two women broke into his truck and stole his wallet 02-01-2003 797. Anger Management A hit-and-run suspect tries to avoid formal charges by claiming abuse; a suspect asks to be sent to jail; officers in Las Vegas must detain an erratic suspect high on drugs. 11-08-2008 582. Animal Encounters Potbelly pig terrorizes neighborhood; bird attacks officer's feet; baby alligator; python wanders into residential area. 02-26-2003 439. Arizona Stolen car suspect is pursued; man tosses his sister's belongings into the street; woman attempts to steal a bicycle; in Arizona. 05-01-1999 450. Arizona Suspects nearly hit an officer during a getaway; officers arrest a man throwing things off a balcony; a man says his girlfriend ran into a field intending to commit suicide; in Arizona. 09-18-1999 521. Arizona A fleeing motorist crashes into a ditch; officers question a man who says his girlfriend was destroying his house; a woman says her ex-boyfriend beat her. 05-19-2001 515. Arizona A suspect ditches a stolen bike and flees into the Arizona desert; officers find an intoxicated stripper on a hallway floor. 04-28-2001 516. Arizona A vehicle may be connected to a robbery; a man struggles with a drug overdose; officers stop a fight. 05-05-2001 520. Arizona Suspects abandon a vehicle; a brown bear disturbs citizens; a girl is injured in a shooting. 05-19-2001 518. Arizona Police officers respond to a reported armed robbery and carjacking; a suspect in a stolen vehicle flees at 85 mph. 05-12-2001 442. Arizona Tour of the county jail; heated argument ends in a fired weapon; automobile accident; woman is injured during an argument. 05-22-1999 446. Arizona Deputy pursues fleeing subject on foot; transients wander in traffic; stolen vehicle pursued; in Arizona. 07-31-1999 441. Arizona A policeman is struck by a car while on bicycle patrol; a man allegedly suffers a beating from his wife's brothers. 05-15-1999 522. Arizona Hit-and-run suspect flees on foot into traffic; stabbing call; a routine stop reveals a weapon and drug paraphernalia. 07-07-2001 440. Arizona Stolen sports utility vehicle pursuit; domestic dispute ends in injuries; a suspect cannot spell his name; in Arizona. 05-08-1999 673. Armed&Dangerous Special Edition An officer responds to a robbery-in-progress call at a nearby fast food restaurant. 05-21-2005 883. Arrests With a Twist Two suspects threaten undercover officers with a gun; two people are arrested for solicitation and prostitution in Louisiana. 09-10-2011 901. Arrests With a Twist No. 2 A suspect tries to evade officers by hiding in his 4-year-old daughter's bed; officers find cocaine and marijuana in a suspect's car; two armed men are jailed for aggravated assault. 03-31-2012 418. Atlanta Suspect flees a routine traffic stop; man drives with a suspended license; stolen-vehicle suspects; in Atlanta. 10-24-1998 414. Atlanta Officers pursue a man who allegedly committed several traffic infractions;"Freaknik"spring break activities. 09-19-1998 424. Atlanta Motel frequented by alleged drug dealers is raided; security officer aided at a trailer park; traffic stop. 12-05-1998 415. Atlanta Driver avoids a roadblock; burglary suspect is questioned; allegedly stolen vehicle is pursued; in Atlanta. 09-26-1998 416. Atlanta Marijuana suspect claims the herb cures the soul; suspect points a gun at passersby; suspect leaps from a bridge; in Atlanta. 10-03-1998 417. Atlanta Drug dealer; homeless man breaks into a car; robbers claim to be police; in Atlanta. 10-10-1998 433. Atlanta High-speed chase; burglar suspect hides near the shed he broke into; vandal is discovered on a rooftop; in Atlanta. 03-06-1999 427. Atlanta In Atlanta, officers pursue a suspect through a city park; a passenger in a stopped car behaves suspiciously. 01-16-1999 419. Atlanta Suspect is questioned after fleeing a traffic stop; transvestites shop with a stolen credit card; in Atlanta. 10-24-1998 425. Atlanta Drug dealer is questioned; dispute erupts between transients; car thief is caught sleeping in a stolen van; in Atlanta. 12-19-1998 413. Atlanta In Atlanta: standoff with a suicidal man; domestic dispute involves an ex-con; gruesome discovery in abandoned car. 09-12-1998 <Back 1 2 3 4 5 Next > 21-60 of 903 10 15 25 40 Per Page
